mapper.insert: INSERT INTO stu_term_tuition ( yearterm_cd, student_no, tuition_sum, scholarship_sum, final_amount, pay_done_yn, pay_done_at ) VALUES ( #{yeartermCd}, #{studentNo}, #{tuitionSum}, #{scholarshipSum}, #{finalAmount}, #{payDoneYn}, #{payDoneAt} )
mapper.select: SELECT yearterm_cd, student_no, tuition_sum, scholarship_sum, final_amount, pay_done_yn, pay_done_at FROM stu_term_tuition WHERE yearterm_cd = #{yeartermCd} AND student_no = #{studentNo}
SELECT yearterm_cd, student_no, tuition_sum, scholarship_sum, final_amount, pay_done_yn, pay_done_at FROM stu_term_tuition ORDER BY yearterm_cd, student_no
